tab1.text1:
<TextStyle.LightBlue><TextStyle.LightBlue>This is a Speed PVP server. 
Join our Discord to help us make the server better. 
If u like to Donate pls join the Discord for more info.</>
tab1.text2:
<TextStyle.LightBlue>- 50Coins every 30min 
- Cave Building is allowed 
-high turret damage 
-fast breeding 
-use Cryo terminal to auto pickup babies</>
tab1.text3:
<TextStyle.LightBlue>Violating any of the following rules will result in a warning, kick, ban or Dinos/Structures/Tribe being deleted.

General:
- Use common sense (like no meshing)
- No hacking, exploiting or bug abusing. This includes under meshing/building outside the world borders and exploits like building into a base. 
- No spamming, racism, sexism, homophobia, or advertising in chat.
- Aggressive or 'toxic' behavior is not welcome.
- If a streamer is on the server, do not stream sniping them. If valid proof is given from the streamer, this will result with punishment.
- Respect all players and try to get along.

Building:
- No under meshing/building outside the world borders and building into a base.
- Building in artifacts/drops caves is allowed.
- Blocking or preventing access to obelisks will result in all tribe structures to be removed.
- No random Turrets
- If u got raided and rebuild somewhere else, remove your old Base or u risk a Structure Wipe.

Raiding:
- no 3rd party raiding/defending.
- Only 2 unmounted soakers at a time.
- Do not cage anyone for longer than 30 minutes.
- Do not raid the same tribe over and over, forcing them to quit. Everyone deserves a chance. Doing this will end in punishment.
- Remove fobs after raid. 

If you're not sure if something is allowed, just ask. 
If you see a player violate the rules, please provide evidence and make a ticket in the discussion #tickets on Discord. 
Admins will not restore lost items or dinos and have the last word.</>

Waterdrop=100% Bp Chance</>
